entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Frances 2:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
